analysis.description:
Reentrancy in NOLLYCOINCrowdFund.buyPreSaleTokens (/unique_chucks/4/0xb69096a89389638518725adfcf279f3f82efa2de.sol#365-377):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(beneficiary,amount) (/unique_chucks/4/0xb69096a89389638518725adfcf279f3f82efa2de.sol#372-376)
	External calls sending eth:
	- fundTransfer(msg.value) (/unique_chucks/4/0xb69096a89389638518725adfcf279f3f82efa2de.sol#369-372)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokenSoldInPresale (/unique_chucks/4/0xb69096a89389638518725adfcf279f3f82efa2de.sol#373)

NOLLYCOIN.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/4/0xb69096a89389638518725adfcf279f3f82efa2de.sol#138) shadows:
	- ERC20.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/4/0xb69096a89389638518725adfcf279f3f82efa2de.sol#34)

NOLLYCOINCrowdFund.endCrowdfund (/unique_chucks/4/0xb69096a89389638518725adfcf279f3f82efa2de.sol#318-333) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(founderMultiSigAddress,remainingToken) (/unique_chucks/4/0xb69096a89389638518725adfcf279f3f82efa2de.sol#328-331)
